name: cs2roaster
description: A Discord bot that roasts Counter-Strike 2 players based on their Leetify statistics

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:syntax
scripts.test:syntax: node --check index.js && node --check config.js && node --check commands/link.js && node --check commands/setup.js && node --check commands/stats.js && node --check commands/tracker.js && node --check services/leetifyApi.js && node --check services/matchTracker.js && node --check utils/guildConfigManager.js && node --check utils/userLinksManager.js && node --check utils/cs2RoastGenerator.js
